summary: Everyone’s out here saying “This hit’s different” now that Dan’s come out, but let’s not forget these actual moments that for...
body:
Everyone’s out here saying “This hit’s different” now that Dan’s come out, but let’s not forget these actual moments that for real hit different.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=55I02lvnKtc

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=94T1LDFZSXI

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UhojRp_R0is
(specifically 3:53-4:00)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zU_g21F6W0M&list=WL&index=7

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yk_KeMhrLxQ&list=WL&index=12

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wp2TUPo5W0c&list=WL&index=15

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xACdTzmyaQI&list=WL&index=13

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sm2S7lvgsBI&list=WL&index=6

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Azy1ruTB-xo
(9:23-end 😭)

I’m sure there’s so many more but these are some of the main ones that I’ve seen literally every single person overlook but they’re the most important videos directly relating to Dan’s experiences.

And seriously, don’t make his coming out about Phan. It’s so much more than that. His whole life he’s been hiding who he is and how he feels and he’s finally found the courage to not only be open with us, but open with himself. Support him in these times, but don’t make it about yourselves.

And seriously, don’t make his coming out about Phan. It’s so much more than that. His whole life he’s been hiding who he is and how he feels and he’s finally found the courage to not only be open with us, but open with himself. Support him in these times, but don’t make it about yourselves.

blog.name: the-quirky-ravenclaw
blog.title: you are loved!
blog.description:
juliana | 17 | she/her | queer | ENTJ | books | art | rainy days | sunsets | shark enthusiast | plant mom | positivity | @pentapocalypse

aesthetic - @lilac-colored-skies

studyblr - @julie-studies

body:
thoughts on dan’s coming out 🏳️‍🌈

i don’t watch dan and phil like i used to but this moment still has a special place in my heart. i haven’t seen many queer individuals in main media that don’t identify with any sort of label and seeing him openly discuss this topic made me feel so accepted. i’ve never been someone who felt like i needed to label my identity, but i’ve always felt like this was wrong and that i’d have to figure it out eventually. after his coming out it’s great to see all of the other formless blobs out there sharing their stories. overall, i feel that this video isn’t just important for him, but important to all of those looking to see themselves in the people they look up to; not to mention the fact that he made so many eloquent and powerful statements about acceptance and diversity. i also want to mention phil because in a way this was a bit of a coming out for him as well and i’m proud of him for that. i hope everyone’s having a happy pride month and i wish you all the best 🏳️‍🌈💗

summary: hi!! i just wanted to say that i’ve rejoined the phandom after about a year’s absence! i used to have several urls, including...
body: hi!! i just wanted to say that i’ve rejoined the phandom after about a year’s absence! i used to have several urls, including @/howellldareyou and @/itsupposedtobecheesy, and i went by lynn then. i miss my old friends! i’m hoping to regain some of the following i used to have, and i follow back from my main, @louvregf. love you guys!

tags: i just want them to feel safe and happy
summary:
I wonder if they will behave differently in their videos together. 
I hope they feel comfortable and that they don't need worry...
body:
I wonder if they will behave differently in their videos together.

I hope they feel comfortable and that they don’t need worry about hiding little intimate moments. And, if every video looks the same as it did before, I hope that’s how they’d like it to be.

reblog.comment:
